concept.title: SDC Record Files
concept.shortdesc: Use the SDC Record Files destination to write files that use the SDC Record data format to a local file system. SDC Records are JSON files of a specific format.

conbody.p: Use SDC Record Files to create output files that can be easily reprocessed by another pipeline. You can use the Directory origin with the SDC Record data format to process records written by SDC Record Files.
